descriptionText: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources. This rule requires each container to have the annotation `container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/<container>` set to `runtime/default` or to a `localhost/<profile>` value. Missing or invalid annotations are reported as MissingAttribute or IncorrectValue issues. The rule validates annotations on Pod templates, Job templates, and top-level Pod resources.
